duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist veterinarians during examinations and procedures, and perform various technical tasks related to animal care and treatment.
Administer medications, vaccinations, and treatments as prescribed by veterinarians.
Conduct laboratory tests and analyze results to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of animal illnesses and injuries.
Provide compassionate care and handle animals with patience and gentleness, ensuring their comfort and well-being.
Communicate with pet owners, providing guidance on animal care, treatment plans, and preventive healthcare measures.
Maintain medical records, prepare and sterilize surgical instruments, and ensure cleanliness and organization in the clinic or hospital.
